code: var getDataApi=function getDataApi(){return fetch("http://hp-api.herokuapp.com/api/characters").then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){var cleanData=data.map(function(character,index){return{id:index,name:character.name,alive:character.alive,species:character.species,image:character.image,house:character.house,gender:character.gender,alternateNames:character.alternate_names};});return cleanData;});};export default getDataApi;
